scenarios.name: Complete network partition
scenarios.description: Simulate complete network failure between queen and hive
scenarios.expected_behavior: System should detect failure and retry with exponential backoff

scenarios.name: High latency
scenarios.expected_behavior: Requests should complete but with degraded performance

scenarios.name: Packet loss
scenarios.expected_behavior: TCP should retransmit and requests should eventually succeed

scenarios.name: Slow network
scenarios.expected_behavior: Large responses should be throttled but complete

scenarios.name: Connection reset
scenarios.expected_behavior: Clients should retry and eventually succeed
